theHighwayman:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theHighwayman:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theHighwayman:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theHighwayman:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theHighwayman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theHighwayman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theHighwayman:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theHighwayman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theHighwayman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theHighwayman:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theHighwayman:VigorousCard.NAME: Vigorous
theHighwayman:VigorousCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, gain 1 thehighwayman:ammo. NL You can now stack charges of thehighwayman:ammo.

theHighwayman:TrackingShot.NAME: Tracking Shot
theHighwayman:TrackingShot.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theHighwayman:Grapeshot.NAME: Grapeshot
theHighwayman:Grapeshot.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.NAME: Double Barrel
theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thehighwayman:ammo. NL The next card played that thehighwayman:fires is played twice. NL Exhaust.
theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thehighwayman:ammo. NL The next card played that thehighwayman:fires is played twice.

theHighwayman:CycleOfViolence.NAME: Duelist's Advance
theHighwayman:CycleOfViolence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain 1 thehighwayman:Riposte.
